deleteQuizDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the quiz:
copyDescription: Once you copy the quiz, you will be able to edit it and make it your own.
inspotext: Create unforgettable quizzes and events with Zap! Whether it'sonline team building, live interactive games, icebreakers, orengaging lessons, Zap makes it easy to connect and excite youraudience—anytime, anywhere.

stepTitles.0: Build it, quiz it, win it!
stepTitles.2: Watch the action unfold & enjoy the fun!

stepText.0: Get started with Zap by creating quiz and game night slides. Add a variety of interactive challenges to keep your friendsengaged, all within one easy-to-use app.
stepText.1: Your friends can join the fun on any device, just by scanning a QR code or using a link—no apps required!
stepText.2: Follow the answers, points, and results as they unfold, intensifying the excitement until a winner is crowned.
